posts.post_content:
Hello all,
Here is a T206 Sovereign 350 Howie Camnitz Arms Crossed.  I have 2 of these, so would like to sell one.  Paypal gift is best, but other forms will do.  The first email takes it @ $30.
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
